description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 5039/APP/2024/1316 dated 30th July 2024 for the change in trigger of Condition 5 (Contamination).
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details and content set out under Cover Letter reference JM/KN0028/20 dated 22nd August 2024.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part 2 - Development Management Policies (2020) and the London Plan (2021).
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details and content set out under Cover Letter reference JM/KN0028/20 dated 22nd August 2024.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part 2 - Development Management Policies (2020) and the London Plan (2021).
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details and content set out under Cover Letter reference JM/KN0028/20 dated 22nd August 2024.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part 2 - Development Management Policies (2020) and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than the trigger of Condition 5 (to allow demolition, site clearance, preparation, ground work and drainage work prior full approval of the condition), all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Reference 5039/APP/2024/1316 dated 30th July 2024 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than the trigger of Condition 5 (to allow demolition, site clearance, preparation, ground work and drainage work prior full approval of the condition), all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Reference 5039/APP/2024/1316 dated 30th July 2024 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
